extension.name: OPC Theme - BandBox
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: Band Box theme can show two steps within your checkout. It can validate username or email before rest of the details are submitted.

param.name: use_delimiters
param.label: Use VM delimiters
param.description: Will display delimiters in checkout areas of bill to, shipping or cart fields. They are not enabled by default, so they don't break your design by default. You may need to create new delimiters, as the core delimiters may get reordered by OPC logic.

param.name: product_subtotal
param.label: Display Product subtotal instead of an Unitprice
param.description: Display Product subtotal instead of an Unitprice

param.name: bottom_article
param.label: Bottom Article ID
param.description: Set bottom article, it will be rendered without the Title.
